title: SRFI 229: Tagged Procedures
author: Marc Nieper-Wi√ükirchen
content:
SRFI 229 is now in draft status.    This SRFI defines tagged procedures, which are procedures
      that are tagged with a Scheme value when created through the
      syntax lambda/tag and case-lambda/tag.  The
      value of the tag of a procedure can be retrieved
      with procedure-tag, and the
      predicate procedure/tag? discerns whether a procedure is
      tagged.
